description:
It’s no secret that everyone wants and expects a great user experience. This
leads to lower training costs, fewer errors, and happier users. SAP Fiori
provides a great user experience (UX) for SAP software. It comprises hundreds
of intuitive apps as well as a set of user experience design guidelines.This
course is all about taking those SAP Fiori design guidelines and showing you
how to apply them to your own unique business needs. Or, put another way,
building your own SAP Fiori app that’s just as delightful and user-friendly as
any of the hundreds SAP has built directly.The goal of this course is to
introduce you to the tools, methodologies, and best practices for designing,
creating, and enhancing your very own SAP Fiori app. Included is a “design and
build” challenge where you can submit your work for a chance to win a MacBook
Air!
title: Build Your Own SAP Fiori App in the Cloud
